comments.raw_text: It's actually gotten worse.  It used to be I could open FF on start, move it to my right (secondary) monitor and have FF remember that location for the rest of that work session (die at shutdown).  Now, doesn't EVER remember location set to secondary monitor.  Automatically defaults to primary monitor.  Sucks.  <sigh>
